verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
1 verse:
Let the earth rejoice
See the risen king
On the clouds of praise
He's exalted forever

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
2 verse:
We will rise to him
Son of righteousness
And the earth will shake
With the glory of heaven

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
See the heavens open wide
And his glory like a flood
Fills the earth with salvation
See the nations take his hand
And in righteousness they stand
This is Je - sus' generation

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
2 verse: repeat
We will rise to him
Son of righteousness
And the earth will shake
With the glory of heaven

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Bridge:
Glo - ry glo - ry glo - ry
Emanuel, God is with us
